DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness in adults of 2 different strengths of resiquimod gel applied to common wart(s) five times a week for up to 12 weeks. A second purpose is to evaluate the safety of the drug.
DOC.brief_title: Study With a Topical Gel to Treat Common Warts in Adults
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of common warts Two forms of birth control Pregnant or breast feeding Other types of warts, ie. plantar Currently participating in another clinical study Chronic viral hepatitis B or C
